name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
location: At a building north to the Drainage Channel Site of Grace.

name: Great-Jar's Arsenal
location: Reward for completing the 3 duelist NPC invasions in Dragonbarrow (Caelid North) for the giant Living Jar in the area. You will only be able to access this area by coming up from Siofra Deep River Well in the underground. This area can also be accessed by climbing the roots above the large crystal at the bottom of the valley. However, this is most likely unintentional.

name: Erdtree's Favor
description: Raises maximum HP, Stamina, and Equip Load
longDescription: Raises maximum HP (3%), Stamina (6.75%), and Equip Load (5%)

name: Erdtree's Favor +1
description: Raises maximum HP, Stamina, and Equip Load
longDescription: Raises maximum HP (3.5%), Stamina (8.25%), and Equip Load (6.5%).

name: Erdtree's Favor +2
description: Raises maximum HP, Stamina, and Equip Load
longDescription: Raises maximum HP (4%), Stamina (9.5%), and Equip Load (8%)

name: Radagon's Scarseal
description: Raises attributes, but also increases damage taken
location: Drops from the boss of Weeping Evergaol (Ancient Hero of Zamor) in the Weeping Peninsula. See map here.

name: Radagon's Soreseal
description: Greatly raises attributes, but also increases damage taken
location: Fort Faroth, Caelid: Found on a corpse by dropping down the opening from the roof and exploring around the wooden walkways. [Map Link]

name: Starscourge Heirloom
location: Can be found in Fort Gael.

name: Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom
location: Finish the sidequest given by Gowry in Caelid, then return to Millicent to receive the talisman.

name: Stargazer Heirloom
location: Found on a body lying at the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

name: Two Fingers Heirloom
location: Can be found on the lower level of the Purified Ruins. It is on the chest in front of you as you descend.

name: Silver Scarab
location: Found in a chest in Hidden Path to the Haligtree. In the large central room, there is a broken section of railing. There you can drop down to an invisible platform, and walk to a small room. The chest is past an illusory wall, behind the Grave Glovewort (9). Map Link

name: Bull-Goat's Talisman
location: In the back of Dragonbarrow Cave. From the entrance, take a left into the Giant Bear's patrol route. Search that side of the cave and it will be at the end of it on a corpse.

name: Marika's Scarseal
description: Raises attributes, but also increases damage taken
location: Found on a corpse at the base of the waterfall found at the highest level of Siofra River.

name: Marika's Soreseal
description: Greatly raises attributes, but also increases damage taken
location:
Found on an altar in a room requiring a Stonesword Key in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. Map Link. 
From the Elphael Inner Wall Site of Grace (Map Link), leave the area through the eastern door and head down the ladder to the south-east. After going through the arch, turn right and follow the path, circling the city until you get to the imp statue. Be careful of enemies along the way and inside the room as you pick up the talisman.

name: Daedicar's Woe
location: You get this at the end of Rya's questline if you do not give her the Tonic of Forgetfulness. (edit : Rya will still drop the talisman even if the potion was given to her. After completing the manor questlines, you will find her in the drawing room. Exhaust her dialogues, rest, and go back to her location. She will be gone, and the talisman will be dropped on the floor.)

name: Primal Glintstone Blade
description: Spells consume less FP, but maximum HP is reduced
location: Stargazer Ruins in Mountaintops of the Giants: Found in a chest in an underground area near the center of the ruins. The entrance is sealed by a barrier and there is a talking Jellyfish outside who is looking for her sister. Summon your Spirit Jellyfish that you acquired at the beginning of the game to unlock the seal.

name: Gold Scarab
description: Increases runes obtained from defeated enemies.
location: Dropped by Cleanrot Knight (Sickle) & Cleanrot Knight (Spear) boss found in Abandoned Cave in Caelid.

name: Moon of Nokstella
location: Found in a chest underneath a massive throne in Nokstella, Eternal City.

metadata.notes: this can be calculated

name: Green Turtle Talisman
location: Summonwater Village. In an underground area on the outskirts of the village.

name: Prince of Death's Pustule
location:
Can be located at Stormveil Castle. 
Nearest Site of Grace can be located at Liftside Chamber. 
Looted off a corpse that can be found at the pit of the castle's crypt. The body can be found next to a giant face that is structured from roots. It is guarded by a Root Monster, players will need to defeat the guardian to reach the spot.

name: Warrior Jar Shard
description: Boosts the attack power of skills
location: Drops from Iron Fist Alexander after completing his questline.

name: Shard of Alexander
description: Greatly boosts the attack power of skills
location: Drops from Iron Fist Alexander after completing his questline.

name: Millicent's Prosthesis
description: Boosts dexterity, raises attack power with successive attacks
location:
When you are given the choice at the end of Millicent's questline between aiding or challenging her, choose to challenge her. When you kill her, you will automatically receive this talisman. Map Link 
Alternatively, to obtain both this and the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia (given when you assist her), kill Millicent after assisting her. Doing so will prevent you from obtaining Miquella's Needle.

metadata.notes: this can be calculated

name: Magic Scorpion Charm
description: Raises Magic Damage, but lowers damage negation
location:
Obtained from talking to Preceptor Seluvis after obtaining the Fingerslayer Blade but before giving it to Ranni the Witch. 
Obtained by giving Preceptor Seluvis the Amber Starlight after Seluvis tells you about his scheme.

name: Lightning Scorpion Charm
description: Raises Lightning Damage, but lowers damage negation.
location: Can be found in the Wyndham Catacombs in a room sealed by an Imp Statue, requires a Stonesword Key.

name: Fire Scorpion Charm
description: Raises Fire Damage, but lowers damage negations
location: Found up the ramparts on a wooden platform to the west in Fort Laiedd within Mt. Gelmir.

metadata.notes: this can be calculated

name: Sacred Scorpion Charm
description: Raises Holy Damage, but lowers damage negation
location: Dropped by invader Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater when defeated.

name: Red-Feathered Branchsword
description: Raises attack power when HP is low
location: Liurnia of the Lakes: Drops from a Deathbird boss that spawns directly north-east of Scenic Isle site of grace near collapsed structure at night. [Elden Ring

name: Ritual Sword Talisman
description: Raises attack power when HP is at maximum
location: Located in Lux Ruins, in a chest down a set of stairs after the boss.

name: Spear Talisman
description: Enhances counterattacks unique to thrusting weapons
location: Found in a chest inside Lakeside Crystal Cave near a demi-human campfire. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Hammer Talisman
location: Dropped by defeating Recusant Henricus North-East of Stormhill Shack.

name: Winged Sword Insignia
description: Raises attack power with successive attacks
location: Stillwater Cave: Dropped by the Cleanrot Knight boss upon defeat.

name: Rotten Winged Sword Insignia
description: Greatly raises attack power with successive attacks
location: Earned after choosing to assist Millicent and successfully defeat her sisters.

name: Dagger Talisman
location: On a corpse. The closest Site of Grace is the Temple of Eiglay. Two Stonesword Keys are required to reach the item.

name: Arrow's Reach Talisman
location: Inside the tower above Stormgate. It can be accesed by going up and turn left, all around until you get back to Stormgate but through the upper ground. Map Coordinates Link.

name: Blue Dancer Charm
description: Raises attack power with lower equipment load
location: Dropped by the Guardian Golem boss in the Highroad Cave.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Twinblade Talisman
description: Enhances final hit of chain attacks.
location: Castle Morne: From the "Back of the Castle" Site of Grace, drop down to the western end of the castle and follow the path along the outer walls. There is a tower section of the walls in the westernmost corner. Climb up the ladder and go around the tower to find a chest where the talisman can be found.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Axe Talisman
location: Found in a cellar underneath the Mistwood Ruins.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Lance Talisman
location: Northeast Stormhill.

name: Arrow's Sting Talisman
description: Raises attack power of arrows and bolts
location: Located in a chest on the top of the tower directly above Impassable Greatbridge (Grace), which is infront of the Redmane Castle in Caelid.

name: Lord of Blood's Exultation
description: Blood loss in vicinity increases attack power
location: Drops from Esgar, Priest of Blood in Leyndell Catacombs.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
description: Poisoning or rot in vicinity increases attack power
location: Dropped by the Kindred of Rot in Seethewater Cave.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Claw Talisman
location: Located at Stormveil Castle, looted off a corpse situated on a watchtower.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Roar Medallion
location: Dropped by the Stonedigger Troll, located in the Limgrave Tunnels. He is found at the end of the dungeon.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Curved Sword Talisman
location: Looted from a treasure chest inside the room where you fight the Banished Knight, located at the wine cellar of Stormveil Castle. You must use the secret back entrance that Gatekeeper Gostoc suggests to reach the said room.

name: Companion Jar
location: After complete Jar Bairn's side quest at Jarburg, recieve from Jar Bairn's previous location.

name: Perfumer's Talisman
location: Can be found in Perfumer's Ruins in a chest underground below stairs in the room with the yellow poison flower.

name: Graven-School Talisman
location:
Found up the ladder close to the Debate Hall Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria and then down the hole to another the room with potboys. 
Before the Red Wolf of Radagon, hit the bookshelf next to the left stair-case which will lead to a secret room. Go up the ladder close to the left, near the entrance of the room. Run down the left side and then jump down the hole of the broken wooden structure to another room with Living Jars.

name: Graven-Mass Talisman
location: Albinauric Rise within the eastern Consecrated Snowfield, which can be accessed using both Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left) and Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right) at the Grand Lift of Rold.

name: Faithful's Canvas Talisman
location: Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Located on a corpse guarded by two Prawn Miners.

name: Flock's Canvas Talisman
description: Greatly raises the potency of Incantations
location: Drops from Gowry after completing the Millicent questline and killing him.

name: Old Lord's Talisman
location:
Found in a chest in Crumbling Farum Azula. Map Link. 
When you get on the large crumbling bridge, instead of going up to the boss, go the opposite way down to a building. Navigate through it and take the ladder down to a bridge connecting to the tower housing the chest.

name: Radagon Icon
location: Raya Lucaria Academy: Found inside a treasure chest on the second floor of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace. From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, head forward leading to the courtyard. Make a hard right and jump over the fence. Climb up the ladder and head through the broken glass window. The treasure chest is on the east section.

name: Godfrey Icon
location:
Drops from Godefrey the Grafted 
Golden Lineage Evergaol, east of Grand Lift of Dectus.

name: Crucible Scale Talisman
description: Reduces damage taken from critical hits by 30%.
location: Can be found in Leyndell Catacombs.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Crucible Feather Talisman
description: Improves dodge rolling but increases damage taken
location: Auriza Hero's Grave.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Blue-Feathered Branchsword
description: Raises defense when HP is low.
location: Drops from a Deathbird east of the Warmaster's Shack near collapsed structure with Rune Fragments and Sanctuary stones on it.

metadata.notes: try pairing with Ritual Shield Talisman

name: Ritual Shield Talisman
description: Raises defense when HP is at maximum.
location: From the West Capital Rampart site of grace in Leyndell, follow the marble stairway heading South-Southwest, past a Valiant Gargoyle near a Golden Seed and up the stair toward a giant Colloseum, the talisman is at the top of the hill, in front of the door of the Colloseum.

metadata.notes: try pairing with Blue-Feathered Branchsword

name: Greatshield Talisman
location: Found in a chest on a Wagon East of Grace "Erdtree-Gazing Hill" behind Ancient Dragon Lansseax.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Crucible Knot Talisman
description: Reduces damage and impact of headshots taken.
location: Dropped by Omenkiller, located in the Village of the Albinaurics.

name: Crimson Seed Talisman
description: Boosts HP regeneration from Flask of Crimson Tears
location: Found in locked imp's room in Sainted Hero's Grave (Altus Plateau). This area is accessed after defeating Black Knife Assassin outside.

name: Cerulean Seed Talisman
description: Boosts FP restoration from Flask of Cerulean Tears.
location: Can be found in Carian Study Hall.

name: Blessed Dew Talisman
location: Leyndell: Found west of the Divine Bridge Site of Grace, guarded by a Golem.

name: Taker's Cameo
location: Awarded by Tanith at Volcano Manor after completing the third letter quest. This requires you to visit the Mountaintops of the Giants, invade and defeat Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood.

name: Godskin Swaddling Cloth
location: Spiritcaller's Cave: Dropped by the Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble in a consecutive boss encounter.

name: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
location: Dropped by Black Knife Assassin, found inside Deathtouched Catacombs.

name: Assassin's Cerulean Dagger
location: Dropped by the Black Knife Assassin boss found in Black Knife Catacombs in the northeast of the Liurnia of the Lakes region.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Crepus's Vial
description: Eliminates all sound made by the wearer during movement
location: Obtained by the enemy you kill during the second assassination task in the Volcano Manor questline, Rileigh the Idle.

name: Concealing Veil
description: Conceals wearer while crouching away from foes
location: Dropped by the boss in Sage's Cave.

name: Carian Filigreed Crest
location: Can be purchased from War Counselor Iji as part of Blaidd's questline.

metadata.notes: see if this can be calculated

name: Longtail Cat Talisman
description: Grants immunity to fall damage, but does not prevent death from a high fall
location: Raya Lucaria Academy: Looted off a corpse that can be found at the bottom section of the large rotating lift. Past the graveyard section of Raya Lucaria Academy, simply ride the lift down and defeat the single Pendulum Statue enemy.

name: Shabriri's Woe
location: Can be found on a body at the edge of the Frenzied Flame Village.

name: Sacrificial Twig
description: Will be lost on death in place of runes.
location:
Sold by Patches at Murkwater Cave after he sets up shop. 
3 sold by the Isolated Merchant at the Weeping Peninsula for 3.000 runes each. 
Liurnia of the Lakes: Found on a corpse sitting by a stone platform jutting out of the cliffs in the southern landmass. This is accessible from the top of the long stretch of land where the Malefactor's Evergaol is located. 
3 sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 3,000 er runes each. 
Given by Edgar when spoken to for the first time at Castle Morne.

name: Furled Finger's Trick-Mirror
description: Take on appearance of a Host of Fingers.
location: Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for 5,000 Runes.

name: Host's Trick-Mirror
description: Take on appearance of a cooperator.
location: Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for 5,000 Runes.

name: Ancestral Spirit's Horn
location: Obtained when unlocking the Remembrance of the Regal Ancestor's power by handing it over to Enia at Roundtable Hold.
